p: In China, the NFATP was initiated at a nationwide scale in 2003 [ 14] and all individuals with HIV infections who provide consent can currently be treated [ 15]. However, genotyping was not performed for PLWHA before the initiation of ART in China. In this large cross-sectional study conducted in multiple provinces in China in 2017, the prevalence of PDR among all adults was evaluated. This study is to estimate the prevalence of PDR among individuals ≥18 years of age as well as the associated risk factors and to explore PDR related transmission in China.
